title: Apocalypse Now
description: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

title: Alien
description: After a space merchant vessel receives an unknown transmission as a distress call, one of the crew is attacked by a mysterious life form and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

title: Kramer vs. Kramer
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Actress in a Supporting Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: Ted Kramer's wife leaves him, allowing for a lost bond to be rediscovered between Ted and his son, Billy. But a heated custody battle ensues over the divorced couple's son.

title: Monty Python's Life of Brian
description: Born on the original Christmas in the stable next door to Jesus Christ, Brian of Nazareth spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

title: Stalker
description: A guide leads two men through an area known as the Zone to find a room that grants wishes.

title: Manhattan
production_studio: Jack Rollins & Charles H. Joffe Productions
description: The life of a divorced television writer dating a teenage girl is further complicated when he falls in love with his best friend's mistress.

title: Being There
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: A simple-minded, sheltered gardener becomes an unlikely trusted advisor to a powerful tycoon and an insider in Washington politics.

title: All That Jazz
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Original Song Score and Its Adaptation or Best Adaptation Score
description: Director/choreographer Bob Fosse tells his own life story as he details the sordid life of Joe Gideon, a womanizing, drug-using dancer.

title: Breaking Away
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: A small-town boy obsessed with the Italian cycling team vies for the affections of a college girl.

title: Lupin III: The Castle of Cagliostro
description: A dashing thief, his gang of desperadoes and a samurai plan to steal the treasure of the Grand Duchy of Cagliostro, but things don't go as planned.

title: Escape from Alcatraz
description: Alcatraz is the most secure prison of its time. It is believed that no one can ever escape from it, until three daring men make a possible successful attempt at escaping from one of the most infamous prisons in the world.

title: The Warriors
description: In the near future, a charismatic leader summons the street gangs of New York City in a bid to take it over. When he is killed, The Warriors are falsely blamed and now must fight their way home while every other gang is hunting them down.

title: Mad Max
description: In a self-destructing world, a vengeful Australian policeman sets out to stop a violent motorcycle gang.

title: Nosferatu the Vampyre
description: Count Dracula moves from Transylvania to Wismar, spreading the Black Plague across the land. Only a woman pure of heart can bring an end to his reign of horror.

title: The Tin Drum
description: Oskar Matzerath, a very unusual boy, refuses to grow up as a form of protest against the madness of the adult world.

title: The China Syndrome
description: A reporter finds what appears to be a cover-up of safety hazards at a nuclear power plant.

title: The Black Stallion
description: After being shipwrecked with a wild Arabian horse on a desert island, a boy befriends the animal, and after their rescue they prepare to race in the championship.

title: The Jerk
description: An idiotic man struggles to make it through life on his own in St. Louis.

title: The Muppet Movie
description: Kermit and his newfound friends trek across America to find success in Hollywood, but a frog-legs merchant is after Kermit.

title: Hair
description: Claude Hooper Bukowski leaves the family ranch in Oklahoma for New York where he is rapidly embraced into the hippie group of friends led by Berger, yet he's already been drafted.

title: Norma Rae
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: A young single mother and textile worker agrees to help unionize her mill despite the problems and dangers involved.

title: Wise Blood
description: A man returns home from the army to find his family farm has been abandoned. He starts his own church, the Church of Truth Without Christ.

title: The Marriage of Maria Braun
description: Maria Braun marries Hermann Braun in the last days of World War II. After he goes missing, she must struggle to survive in post-war Germany.

title: Woyzeck
description: A lowly soldier is subjected to humiliating experiments by a doctor and is betrayed by his wife, leading to a tragic breakdown.

title: Vengeance Is Mine
description: Based on the true story of Iwao Enokizu, a con artist and serial killer who eluded police across Japan for 78 days.

title: Christ Stopped at Eboli
description: A doctor and painter is exiled by the Fascist government to a remote village in Southern Italy, where he discovers a new perspective on life.

title: The Onion Field
description: Two cops are kidnapped by two petty criminals. One cop escapes, but the other is killed, leading to a long and harrowing legal battle.

title: Hardcore
description: A conservative businessman descends into the seedy underworld of pornography in California to find his missing teenage daughter.

title: Time After Time
description: H.G. Wells pursues Jack the Ripper to the 20th Century when the serial murderer uses the future writer's time machine to escape his time period.

title: Quadrophenia
description: Jimmy Cooper is a disillusioned Mod who hates his job and his parents, seeking solace in his scooter, amphetamines, and the company of his Mod friends during the Brighton riots.

title: Scum
description: A grim and violent look at the brutal life inside a British borstal (juvenile detention center).

title: Tale of Tales
description: A poetic non-linear animation that weaves together memories and dreams, featuring a little gray wolf.

title: Siberiade
description: An epic story spanning several decades about two feuding families in a remote Siberian village and the changes brought by history.

title: Buffet Froid
description: A surreal black comedy about an unemployed man who gets involved with a murderer and a police inspector in an increasingly absurd series of events.

title: My Brilliant Career
description: A headstrong young woman in late 19th-century Australia is determined to become a writer, rejecting a marriage proposal from a wealthy suitor.

title: A Little Romance
description: Two teenagers, a French boy and an American girl, run away to Venice to kiss under the Bridge of Sighs at sunset, believing it will make their love eternal.

title: The Rose
description: A self-destructive female rock star struggles to deal with the pressures of her career and the demands of her ruthless manager.

title: ...And Justice for All
description: An ethical defense attorney battles corruption in the legal system when he is forced to defend a judge accused of rape.

title: Murder by Decree
description: Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson investigate the Jack the Ripper murders and uncover a conspiracy involving the British government and the Freemasons.

title: Real Life
description: A pushy filmmaker attempts to document the life of a typical American family, but his intrusive presence begins to tear them apart.

title: The In-Laws
description: A mild-mannered dentist gets entangled in the dangerous espionage schemes of his future in-law just days before their children's wedding.

title: Rocky II
description: Rocky struggles in family life after his bout with Apollo Creed, while the embarrassed champ insistently goads him into accepting a rematch to prove his victory wasn't a fluke.

title: Don Giovanni
description: A cinematic adaptation of Mozart's opera about the legendary seducer Don Juan.

title: The Great Santini
description: A tough Marine pilot treats his family like his troops, much to the dismay of his teenage son.

title: Love on the Run
description: Antoine Doinel divorces his wife Christine and becomes involved with Sabine, a record seller.

title: The Brontë Sisters
description: The story of the famous literary sisters Charlotte, Emily, and Anne Brontë, and their brother Branwell.

title: Heartland
description: A widow and her daughter take a housekeeping job for a gruff Scottish farmer in Wyoming in 1910.

title: Over the Edge
description: Bored teenagers in a planned community rebel against authority after one of them is killed by a police officer.

title: Going in Style
description: Three elderly men living in Queens, New York, decide to rob a bank to relieve their boredom.

title: Saint Jack
description: An American pimp in Singapore dreams of opening his own whorehouse.

title: North Dallas Forty
description: A semi-fictional account of life as a professional American Football player in the 1970s.

title: Camera Buff
description: A factory worker buys a movie camera to film his newborn daughter, but his hobby soon becomes an obsession that threatens his job and his marriage.

title: Salem's Lot
description: A novelist and a young horror fan attempt to save a small New England town which has been invaded by vampires.
